item1.name: HAP (Housing Assistance Payment) Internal System
item1.description: This project supports Irish local authorities in providing housing assistance to households with long-term needs, including Rent Supplement recipients. It streamlines applications and eligibility assessments via an efficient, user-friendly platform.

item2.name: HAP (Housing Assistance Payment) Applications Portal
item2.description: This project enables households with long-term needs and landlords to manage their housing applications effectively.

item3.name: Car Dealer Site
item3.description: This project is a simple website for small car dealerships. The goal is to offer a clean design with minimal functionality, allowing anyone looking for a car to view pictures and contact the dealer if they're interested.

item4.name: Tic-Tac-Toe
item4.description: This project is a simple implementation of the popular game Tic-Tac-Toe. The idea behind this project was to apply Redux in a React project using TypeScript. In this implementation, there's only a player-vs-player mode, where two users can play on the same computer.
